ol.li: How to Talk to Your Students about COVID-19

div.h2: How to Talk to Your Students about COVID-19

div.class: custom_148006 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

p.span: As we move to distance learning, I think it is very important to provide resources and activities to families to help them deal with this stressfulÂ situation along with the normal stressors of daily living.Â Attached is a good resource that could be added to our webpage of parent resources.Â I will be sending more, but this one provides a good overview of how to talk to children about Covid-19 and normalÂ responses of children across the developmental spectrum.Â See you soon!

a.span: Follow this link for more information.
